name: DeepSeaTreasures
description:
Made in 48h for the Global Game Jam 2021, Germany, Niedersachsen
Theme: Lost & Found
Go out to sea and find sunken treasures. Avoid the dangerous oceanic life and upgrade your gear.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
SPACE - Enter/Exit Ship

Credits:
Graphic Artist: Chillertyp
Programming: OLKO
